gatk_docker.title: gatk docker
gatk_docker.description: Docker image to use for Mutect2 tasks. This is only used for backends configured to use docker.

scatter_count.title: scatter count
scatter_count.description: Number of executions to split the Mutect2 task into. The more you put here, the faster Mutect2 will return results, but at a higher cost of resources.

m2_extra_filtering_args.title: extra filtering args
m2_extra_filtering_args.description: (optional) a string of additional command line arguments of the form "-argument1 value1 -argument2 value2" for Mutect 2 filtering. Most users will not need this

m2_extra_args.title: extra args
m2_extra_args.description: (optional) a string of additional command line arguments of the form "-argument1 value1 -argument2 value2" for Mutect 2. Most users will not need this
